term.title: discriminant analysis

item.text: Discriminant analysis is a statistical technique to find a set of descriptors which can be used to detect and rationalize separation between activity classes.

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1137. 'Glossary of terms used in computational drug design (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1142 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769051137)
